description: Introducing the lastest Snap On Slim-Fit PC Case for IPAD 2 Case from Acase Products lineThis unique Polycarbonate with rubber coating case makes the perfect match for Apple Smart Cover !! While the Apple Smart Cover offer the great protection to the front of your new Apple iPad 2, but it gives one disadvantage. It leaves the back of your Apple iPad 2 to expose for scratches and scuff marksAcase has complete the solution. Finished with a unique flex material and the special coating, it allows you to grip your Apple iPad 2 without worry from slipping form your hands. This ultr-slim design add no weight or bulk to your iPad 2. The reinforced corner and edge provide solid protection from drops. It offer complete access to all ports, buttons, and camera.By combine the two together, Apple's Smart cover and Acase's Snap On Slim-Fit PC case. You will have the ulitmate protection and keep your Apple iPad 2 in style and fit.It comes with BLACK - ASIN: B004YI0KK4 And CLEAR
title: Acase Apple iPad 2 Ipad 3 Smart Cover Companion Compatible Case for Apple iPad 2 and ipad 3 (the "New" ipad) - Clear
